bibl.title: Military Orders for Jefferson Randolph Kean, Edwin P. Brewer, and Albert E. Truby, August 24, 1899

div1.p: Kean, Brewer, and Truby are appointed to investigate the loss of medical supplies at Columbia barracks.

div1.head: Military Orders for Jefferson Randolph Kean, Edwin P. Brewer, and Albert E. Truby, August 24, 1899
div1.opener:
HEADQUARTERS DEPT. OF THE PROVINCE OF HAVANA
AND PINAR DEL RIO.
Quemados, Cuba, August 24, 1899.
FROM GEN. ALBERT E. TRUBY
Special Orders,)
No. 249.)
div1.p:
Separate proceedings will be submitted for medical and quarter-
master's property, respectively.
div1.closer:
BY COMMAND OF BRIGADIER GENERAL, LEE: R. M. L. MICHIE,
ASSISTANT ADJUTANT GENERAL. Official:
R.M.L. Michie
A. A. G.
1st Lt. A. E. Truby
Asst. Surg. USA.
